nodes.text: A crab was a type of arthropod crustacean caracterized by its great pincers, carapace, and characteristic six-legged movement similar to the Sauvax's.

Known crabs include the sink crab of Bestine IV, the hitcher crab from Sevarcos II, and the vonduun crab used by the Yuuzhan Vong. The LM-432 droid was nicknamed the "crab" droid because of its similar shape.
Live crabs were an ingredient of crab-stuffed creampuffs, a Mon Calamari delicacy.
